titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duties on ondansetron hydrochloride (bulk and dosage forms).

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9553-9554)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/27/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1995, the duty on 1,2,3,9-tetrahydro-9-methyl-3-((2-methyl-1H-imidazol-1-yl) methyl)-4H-carbazol-4-one hydrochloride dihydrate (ondansetron hydrochloride in bulk and dosage forms).
